title: Nuba Cafe - Mount Pleasant
typeOfFood: Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lebanese cuisine eatery with multiple locations. Modern decor. The vegetarian and vegan items are marked: falafel, hummus, baba ghanouj, eggplant stew with brown rice, and other mezze. Try the Najib's special (cauliflower roasted with lemon and sea salt).
